privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: Roblox needs access to your camera to pair your phone with your viewer for the best experience.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: We'll need access to your contacts to search for your friends on Roblox.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Roblox needs access to the microphone
privacy.NSMotionUsageDescription: Roblox needs access to the accelerometer to enhance your play experience.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Roblox needs access to your photos to enhance your play experience.

privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: You agree that we will access and collect the names of your contacts and their phone numbers and other contact information, so that we can connect you to your friends as they join Roblox. To learn more, go to https://www.roblox.com/info/privacy.
